casebody.data:
UNITED STATES CABINET BED COMPANY, Appellant, v. NEW ENGLAND BEDDING COMPANY, Appellee. No. 74. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 5, 1938. Gustav Drews, of New York City (Hans v. Briesen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Jeffroy J. Lewin, of Long Island City, N. Y. (Robert J. Keating, of Boston, Mass., of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree on authority of Davega, Inc., v. Lincoln Furniture Mfg. Co., 2 Cir., 29 F.2d 164.
